system.description:
When you make use of the secret techniques taught by your company, choose a spell from below, then mark it.

You cannot use a spell while it is marked.

When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.I18nTKFofUw4ewsT]{Fill Your Belly}, remove a mark from one spell.

When you @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.special-moves.Item.YNOTCTxDOQMVmtTO]{Recover}, remove all marks on your spells.

  • A Way Out: You disappear in a puff of smoke, leaving the scene. You may take any allies within arms' reach with you.

  • A Way In: Tell us about a secret entrance. It's right where you say it is.

  • The Trick: Create a sudden and massive distraction that draws all eyes.
system.choices:
• A Way Out: You disappear in a puff of smoke, leaving the scene. You may take any allies within arms' reach with you.
  • A Way In: Tell us about a secret entrance. It's right where you say it is.
  • The Trick: Create a sudden and massive distraction that draws all eyes.
